name: CVE-2025-2294-Kubio-2.5.1-LFi-Checker
description: The Kubio AI Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Local File Inclusion in all versions up to, and including, 2.5.1 via the `kubio_hybrid_theme_load_template` function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to include and execute arbitrary files on the server, allowing the execution of any PHP code in those files..
